perturbation.original_text:
Article 22
"Working Personnel" means all employees and staff of the Joint Venture Company
other than the Management Personnel.
perturbation.changed_text:
Article 22
"Labor Force" means all employees and staff of the Joint Venture Company
other than the Management Personnel.
perturbation.explanation: The term "Working Personnel" is replaced with "Labor Force" without making the required changes to align the nomenclature in the later part of the contract. This creates confusion as both terms refer to a similar group but are used independently, thereby disrupting its clarity. This could cause interpretation issues.

perturbation.original_text:
Article 76
Matters relating to the recruitment, wages, insurance, welfare, dismissal of the
staff and workers of the Joint Venture Company shall be handled in accordance
with the LABOR LAW OF THE PEOPLE'S REPUBLIC OF CHINA and the REGULATIONS OF THE
PEOPLE'S REPUBLIC OF CHINA ON LABOR MANAGEMENT IN FOREIGN INVESTMENT ENTERPRISES
and related PRC regulations. The Joint Venture Company's internal labor policies
shall be established pursuant to relevant PRC laws and regulations, and approved
by the Board of Directors.
perturbation.changed_text:
Article 76
Matters relating to the recruitment, wages, insurance, welfare, dismissal of the
staff and workers of the Joint Venture Company shall be handled in accordance
with the LABOR LAW OF THE PEOPLE'S REPUBLIC OF CHINA and the REGULATIONS OF THE
PEOPLE'S REPUBLIC OF CHINA ON PERSONNEL MANAGEMENT IN FOREIGN INVESTMENT ENTERPRISES
and related PRC regulations. The Joint Venture Company's internal labor policies
shall be established pursuant to relevant PRC laws and regulations, and approved
by the Board of Directors.
perturbation.explanation: The phrase "LABOR MANAGEMENT" has been replaced with "PERSONNEL MANAGEMENT" in the description of PRC regulations. Since these terms are similar but imply different approaches to employee relations, the ambiguity could lead to uncertainty regarding compliance requirements.

perturbation.original_text:
Article 77
The Joint Venture Company shall adopt a labor contract system. The wages,
welfare, labor insurance and other rights and obligations of working personnel
and Management Personnel shall be regulated through individual or group labor
contracts.
perturbation.changed_text:
Article 77
The Joint Venture Company shall adopt a employment contract system. The wages,
welfare, labor insurance and other rights and obligations of working personnel
and Management Personnel shall be regulated through individual or group employment
contracts.
perturbation.explanation: The phrase "labor contract system" has been replaced with "employment contract system" in the description, without further changes within the article. Given that "labor contract" and "employment contract" can be interpreted differently under law, changing the term may alter legal interpretations, leading to potential contradictions and impacting the rights and obligations of parties involved.
